summary: Popular enb converted to the new version and better.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4][img]http://i65.fastpic.ru/big/2015/0301/b2/181473e3e7f7c692282c75c6ea140bb2.png[/img][/size][/b]

     Version of the game without mods for lighting.
     In the newer version will support RLO and ELFX, no exception COT.

[size=4][b][img]http://i65.fastpic.ru/big/2015/0301/83/ecf133863427fdb463f66df9ac436783.png[/img][/b][/size]

     This enb playable 60 fps with a large HD packs.
     i7 4770k / GeForce GTX 770
[size=4]
[img]http://i58.fastpic.ru/big/2015/0301/29/3fe8ed1ca0dc8e93119a0ff9674d1c29.png[/img]
[/size]     1. Download [b][b]ENBSeries v0.221[/b] (enbseries_skyrim_v0221.zip) from [color=#1e84cc][url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0221.htm]http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0221.htm[/url][/color] and extract it somewhere.

     2. Copy [u]d3d9.dll[/u] and [u]enbhost.exe[/u] from the wrapper folder to Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim.
[/b]
     3. Download my ENB, copy all of the files in the ENB folder to where Skyrim.exe is (usually locate at Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim).

     4. Editing the following lines in SkyrimPrefs.ini

        bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
        bTreesReceiveShadows=1
        bDrawLandShadows=1
        bShadowsOnGrass=1

[b][size=4][img]http://i65.fastpic.ru/big/2015/0301/fc/403acb739b9b2ee0bd6fcf6594eb12fc.png[/img]

[/size][/b][youtube]Zmo_TPDzzEE[/youtube]

[size=4][img]http://i65.fastpic.ru/big/2015/0301/42/8c4f78b032d2f74514d365754dfa8d42.png[/img][/size]

[i]     Thank to Boris for enbseries!
[/i][i]     Thank to [/i]Stakado [i]for main enb![/i]
[i]     Thank to [/i]Kyo [i]for dof settings!
[i]     Thank to Google Translate for [i][i]Translate:D[/i][/i][/i][/i]
author: KennyMccormick
